templates.template:
<xf:textboxrow name="options[client_id]" value="{$options.client_id}" label="{{ phrase('client_id') }}" hint="{{ phrase('required') }}" explain="{{ phrase('con_acc_discord_app_id_explain') }}" />
<xf:textboxrow name="options[client_secret]" value="{$options.client_secret}" label="{{ phrase('client_secret') }}" hint="{{ phrase('required') }}" explain="{{ phrase('con_acc_discord_app_secret_explain') }}" />
{$providerData.username} {$providerData.username|parens}
